fields.name: Actions
fields.description: Actions to invoke when the alert fires.

fields.name: AutoMitigate
fields.description: The flag that indicates whether the alert should be automatically resolved or not. The default is true. Relevant only for rules of the kind LogAlert.

fields.name: CheckWorkspaceAlertsStorageConfigured
fields.description: The flag which indicates whether this scheduled query rule should be stored in the customer's storage. The default is false. Relevant only for rules of the kind LogAlert.

fields.name: CreatedWithApiVersion
fields.description: The api-version used when creating this alert rule

fields.name: Criteria
fields.description: The rule criteria that defines the conditions of the scheduled query rule.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the scheduled query rule.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: The display name of the alert rule

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: The flag which indicates whether this scheduled query rule is enabled. Value should be true or false

fields.name: EvaluationFrequency
fields.description: How often the scheduled query rule is evaluated represented in ISO 8601 duration format. Relevant and required only for rules of the kind LogAlert.

fields.name: IsLegacyLogAnalyticsRule
fields.description: True if alert rule is legacy Log Analytic rule

fields.name: IsWorkspaceAlertsStorageConfigured
fields.description: The flag which indicates whether this scheduled query rule has been configured to be stored in the customer's storage. The default is false.

fields.name: MuteActionsDuration
fields.description: Mute actions for the chosen period of time (in ISO 8601 duration format) after the alert is fired. Relevant only for rules of the kind LogAlert.

fields.name: OverrideQueryTimeRange
fields.description: If specified then overrides the query time range (default is WindowSize*NumberOfEvaluationPeriods). Relevant only for rules of the kind LogAlert.

fields.name: Scopes
fields.description: The list of resource id's that this scheduled query rule is scoped to.

fields.name: Severity
fields.description: Severity of the alert. Should be an integer between [0-4]. Value of 0 is severest. Relevant and required only for rules of the kind LogAlert.

fields.name: SkipQueryValidation
fields.description: The flag which indicates whether the provided query should be validated or not. The default is false. Relevant only for rules of the kind LogAlert.

fields.name: TargetResourceTypes
fields.description: List of resource type of the target resource(s) on which the alert is created/updated. For example if the scope is a resource group and targetResourceTypes is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines, then a different alert will be fired for each virtual machine in the resource group which meet the alert criteria. Relevant only for rules of the kind LogAlert

fields.name: WindowSize
fields.description: The period of time (in ISO 8601 duration format) on which the Alert query will be executed (bin size). Relevant and required only for rules of the kind LogAlert.
